r.comm: inswinger to start off, ducks in from short of a length. Bisla defends from the crease.
comes in again from off stump, defended with the movement to the leg side.
Bisla walks down the track briskly - you can do that at Irfan's pace - but doesn't get to the length of the ball. Played to midwicket.
and again, Bisla marches out, and the ball gets big to hit him on the thigh. Don't think he'll walk out the next ball.
Irfan's not giving much to drive, this was short of a length, and Bisla's pre-meditated midwicket heave ends up inside-edged onto his body.
Irfan's started off with a maiden. Short ball angling across, guided to point.
Nehra shares the new ball, defended by Gambhir towards point and he races through for a single
pushed towards cover off the front foot, Bisla yet to get off the mark
backs away from the stumps and carves that past cover for four, powerfully struck by Bisla, but that wasn't the best bit of fielding from Nadeem there, should have stopped it

Bisla is gone, back of a length ball outside, perhaps bounced more than Bisla expected, he was shaping for a big shot, ends up chipping it almost straight up and a host of fielders have time to get under that one, Delhi get their first
that one reared up, much more than Kallis expected, taken by surprise, and struck on the chest
short of length ball on middle stump, defended from the crease to the leg side
typical Gambhir, skips down the track and launches that over his favourite point region for four, hits it over the fielder there to get a boundary
Gambhir in a hurry here, another shimmy down the track and that is powered over long-on for six, just clears the rope by a yard
length ball on off stump, 133.6kph, defended watchfully

tough chance for Manpreet at midwicket, Gambhir looked to thump that through the leg side, juneja moves across and dives forward and gets his hands on it but that was too low for him, very difficult that
classic Kallis, a lofted off drive, one bounce and over the rope for four
defended towards point for a single
length ball heading for off stump, defended from the crease
beautiful from Kallis, pitched up and that is pushed past the bowler for four, minimum fuss as he plays that straight drive
full from Nehra, on middle stump, defended down the pitch

what a shot from Kallis, a stylish pull towards the deep midwicket boundary, lift9ing his front knee as he plays that, the ball seemed headed for four, but Juneja puts in a spectacular effort, haring after the ball and diving to stop that, or has he? replays show he was just too late to let the ball go, tough on the youngster after an excellent effort
well outside off and that is slapped towards point
Umesh is on now, he starts with a full ball outside off, squeezed out towards point
length ball on off stump, gambhir looks to thrash that over mid-on, doesn't connect well, but he manages to connect well enough, just over Jayawardene at mid-on and that goes for four

width for Gambhir, he loves it there, slapped hard towards point, Nadeem should have stopped that, another lackadaisical bit of fielding and that's a boundary, the point region is packed with fielders but gambhir still finds the gap
guides this one towards short third man
down the leg side, and that's a wide
short of length ball, cramps up Kallis a bit, Kallis adjust and steers that down to third man for a single
mistimed by Kallis towards square leg, an easy single results
length ball heading for the pads, tucked behind square leg for one more
short of a length ball outside off, too far outside off, Kallis tears into that, powerfully hit over cover for four, authoritative from Kallis

back of a length ball outside off, drops it at his feet, Warner was the fielder, Kallis says not to the single, Gambhir is down the track a long way,, he would have been dismissed if that was a direct hit, Warner misses though
pushed towards cover this time
length ball just outside off, deflects the ball towards point
stays back in the crease and opens the face to guide that towards third man
length ball on off stump, 137kph from Umesh, solidly defended towards the bowler
length ball slanting towards the pads, Kallis calmly glances that down to fine leg where Irfan Pathan makes a miss of what should have been a regulation stop, Umesh grimaces
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards point
goes for the pull, doesn't connect well enough, Irfan does well this time in the deep to stop it from reaching the rope
Gambhir opens the face and defends that towards point, 140.8kph from Umesh
spin is in, Nadeem bowls, first ball is defended to the off side

Nadeem has struck! with a frankly terrible ball, that was a half-tracker, Kallis could have sent that to any part of leg-side boundary, instead he swipes that straight to midwicket, good catch in the deep, and Nadeem has a big wicket
short and wide outside off, defended back towards the bowler by Tiwary
thick outside edge as Tiwary looks to play that off the front foot, beats Russell at backward point
poked towards point for a single
plenty of spin there for Nadeem, drops it a bit short once more and that turns away from Gambhir a long way, slapped in front of point

Botha nearly gets the crucial wicket of Gambhir first ball, a thick inside-edge as Gambhir looks to force the ball through the off side, just misses the stumps, that was given plenty of air by Botha, nearly got the reward
Gambhir waits for that and places it past point for four, in complete control there, staying well back in the crease
skips down and chips it over extra cover for a single
short from Botha, spinning in towards the stumps, clipped towards square leg
on the pads, tucked past the keeper for a single

once again plenty of flight from Botha and he nearly gets a wicket again, Tiwary is fixed by that one and is early on the shot, ends up lofting the ball towards long-off, was in the air for ages but still lands short of the man in the deep
spinning it past the outside edge as Tiwary looks to guide the ball through the off, plenty of help here for the spinners
struck low on the bat as Tiwary sends the ball towards mid-on
on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg
an inside-edge sends the ball towards backward square leg, Tiwary not at ease against Nadeem
looks for the big sweep and misses, struck on the pads
goes straight on, Gambhir read that though, waited on the back foot and deftly late cuts that past the keeper, that's a test for Umesh at third man, Umesh can't cut it off, Kolkat up to 75 now
tossed up, full ball just outside off, eased towards long-on
Gambhir goes back in the crease and towards leg stump, sends that through the off for another easy single
length ball but Tiwary waits on the back foot for that one, guided towards cover for a couple
shorter from Botha, Tiwary comes down the track and defends
again Tiwary skips down the pitch, lofted towards wide long-on
length ball on off stump, driven back by Gambhir, Botha dives to his right to cut that off
defended off the front foot towards cover
Gambhir down the track and launches the ball, as he so often does, doesn't connect properly this time, in the air and just short of a diving fielder at long-on
swiped off the back foot towards deep midwicket
short of length ball heading for middle, slapped towards deep cover
outside leg stump, Gambhir was looking to make room, bowler followed him, Gambhir still manages to chop that away towards point
whipped towards long-on for another single, again low on the bat as Tiwary plays a wristy shot
starts with a back of length ball that is defended off the back foot
fuller this time, pushed back towards the bowler
steps down the track, makes a bit of room as well, Russell bowls it short but Tiwary opens his arms and hammers that past cover for four
struck on the pads just outside off as he looks to delicately play the ball through the off side
a low full toss on middle stump, again Tiwary isn't completely in control as he pushes that towards long-on, Kolkata cruising here

length ball just outside off, gambhir nearly run out for the second time this innings, he pushes the ball towards point and sets off, only to realise his partner isn't interested, a direct hit and Gambhir would have been yards out, the throw misses and Gambhir is safe

Botha has struck, is that too late for Delhi, Gambhir was waiting on the back foot, this was flatter and not turning much from Botha, Gambhir misses and is struck in front of middle and leg, would that have gone on to hit leg stump? Perhaps, it would have, Taufel was sure though, and he sends Gambhir on his way
length ball just outside off, defended by Morgan who has just faced his first delivery in IPL after a long gap
inside-edged on to the pads as he looks to defend off the back foot

flight from Botha, Morgan brings out the sweep, connects well and Russell needed to sprint across to get to the ball before it reached the rope, he seemed to have done a great job there, but he just touched the rope as he fielded that
eased off the pads towards midwicket
spinning in from outside off, Tiwary is cagey, inside-edges and the ball drops between his pads, Botha posing some questions here
whipped away towards deep midwicket

Is there life left in this game yet? Tiwary has been all at sea against the spinners today, he was looking to sweep this time, sharp turn for Nadeem and that takes the top edge, loops to the left of the keeper, who moves across to collect that
flatter from Nadeem, Yusuf Pathan defends that one
bowled with a round-arm action, more defence from Yusuf
spinning away from Yusuf who defends off the back foot
fired in towards the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a single
Russell sends down a shortish ball that takes off and goes over Yusuf's head
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side by Yusuf
goes for the yorker, misses and it ends as a low full toss, sent away down towards fine leg, Umesh nearly made a hash of that as well, but he manages to stop it cleanly
overpitched and outside off, punched towards sweeper cover
short of length ball on leg stump, pushed towards midwicket by Morgan
Morgan looks to powerfully pull that, horribly mistimed, the ball rolls to the right of the bowler for a single
full and on off stump, eased towards long-on for a single
Umesh is back and Yusuf goes for the pull, bottom-edges it to the off side
short of length and just outside off, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
whipped towards deep midwicket for a single
down the leg side, a free run for Kolkata
short of length ball on middle, clipped towards deep square leg for a quick couple
off the pads towards square leg for two more

a huge hit, Yusuf swings the bat cleanly, and connects well, that isn't off the middle of the bat but still has enough to clear the rope, the long-on and long-off fielders were briefly interested but that was too far for them
a ripping delivery from Russell, leaps up at Yusuf who manages to tap it towards point for a single
swivels as he pulls that short ball towards deep square leg
short of length ball on off stump, Yusuf shuffles across and tucks that behind square leg for a couple
low full toss on off stump, pushed towards cover
on the pads and that is down towards fine leg, 12 off the over, and Delhi will be wondering why they didn't pick Jeevan Mendis on this pitch which is helping the spinners so much
length ball just outside off, defended, 'well bowled, well bowled, johan,' shouts the keeper
looks to chop that one through the off side, bottom edges it and that misses the stumps and goes past the keeper
opens the face to guide that fine past short third man, scores are level, "KKR, KKR," the crowd chants
KKR make a winning start, SRK likes that, a single towards midwicket for the single that confirmed the result
